proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 200 hours a year on manual proposals. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, Shida spends hours crafting each proposal. With our system, get it done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Here are the ongoing losses Shida faces:

problems.title: Wasted Hours
problems.description: Manually creating proposals takes 50 hours a month. That is time not spent on designing for clients.

problems.title: Lost Revenue
problems.description: Spending time on proposals means less time for client work, resulting in $10,000 of annual lost revenue.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Each proposal varies in style. This inconsistency can cost Shida potential clients who value cohesive branding.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Taking days to send proposals can lead to lost deals. Speed is critical in securing new clients.

problems.title: High Opportunity Cost
problems.description: Every hour on a proposal is an hour not spent enhancing design skills. This costs Shida future growth.

problems.title: Stress and Burnout
problems.description: Constant proposal creation adds stress. Stress reduces creativity, impacting the quality of client projects.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system is the replacement for every inefficiency described above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Creation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system generates them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals often lack consistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with Shida's brand.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, tracking proposal status is manual. Our system provides real-time updates on proposal engagement.

solutions.title: Integrated Chatbot
solutions.description: Questions from clients often delay the process. Our chatbot answers instantly, keeping prospects engaged.

solutions.title: Data-Driven Improvements
solutions.description: Improving proposals based on feedback is slow. Our system analyzes data to optimize them continuously.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Visual Impact with Shida's Graphic Design Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Transform Acme Corp's brand presence through a targeted design overhaul, ensuring every interaction is impactful and memorable.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is facing significant losses due to untapped design potential.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves without engaging is potential revenue lost. A 35% bounce rate could mean tens of thousands in lost sales annually.

problems.title: Low Brand Recognition
problems.description: Inconsistent branding results in poor market recall. This can lead to a 20% decrease in customer loyalty and repeat business.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Outdated or unappealing materials can cost up to 15% in missed advertising ROI, reducing campaign effectiveness.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: A confusing interface can drive away customers, potentially losing up to 25% of potential sales conversions.

problems.title: Weak Online Presence
problems.description: Without a strong digital footprint, Acme Corp risks losing 30% of potential new customer engagements.

problems.title: Lack of Emotional Connection
problems.description: A brand that fails to connect emotionally with its audience risks a 40% drop in customer advocacy.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Shida's solutions directly address Acme Corp's current losses.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Design
solutions.description: We create cohesive branding that enhances recognition and loyalty. This ensures Acme Corp stands out in a crowded market.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral
solutions.description: Our team designs impactful marketing materials that drive engagement and improve campaign ROI.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Enhance user experience and conversion rates through a strategically redesigned website.

solutions.title: Digital Strategy
solutions.description: Develop a robust online presence that captures and retains customer interest effectively.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida is your partner in achieving impactful design solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: With over $632K in revenue, we have a history of delivering results.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your needs to ensure you receive tailored solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team excels in innovative design that captures attention and delivers results.

whyUsCards.title: Local Presence
whyUsCards.description: Based in Calgary, Alberta, we understand the local market dynamics.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to transforming your brand.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships with a keen eye for impactful design. He ensures each project aligns with client goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We assess needs and develop a strategic plan.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our team creates designs that align with the strategy.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We execute the plan, ensuring all elements are in place.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: We assess outcomes and optimize for future success.

pricing.name: Basic Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for small-scale projects seeking foundational improvements.

pricing.name: Growth Plan
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses ready to elevate their brand presence.

proposal2.ctaDescription: We invite you to a conversation on how our expertise can address your needs.

Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
